"If you are one of those users who work A lot with Your Device, with \"Eye Shield\" you will be able to manage that time and avoid hurting your Eyes. "

" Thank you For choosing EyeShield.
The Eye is one of most important parts of your body. This application helps you take care of it when you work too long with you device. There are 4 button in main circular menu. The top one is to start with your time which can be set in settings. The left one is Night mode which is useful in dark places. The right button is to enable Day mode for daily and usual times. The bottom one is to turn off the EyeShield is when it is running. After turning on the EyeShield it will show a notification that starts counting time and you can see the time specified according to the mode enabled. You can work with your device without worrying that you might work too long. EyeShield will show a warning after passed time if you keep working. When the warning is shown look at a far distance as long as warning time. after that you can restart working. EyeShield warning will pause the software you are working with, like a game. So do not be worried of losing anything. Please contact us if you have any feedback."
In This Page You Can Contact Us By Your Email for Suggestions And Report.
There are no email clients installed.
In This page you can rate the app if you like.\n Also you can Contact Us if You have suggestions or complains.

The Eye is one of the most important organs of the human body. Yet it is very vulnerable and must be taken care of. Working with electronic devices like phones for a long time can damage the cornea of the eyes.

Using these devices too much can be dangerous to your health after a while. Generally they can not guarantee that your body will not get hurt. So how do you ensure that you will not be damaged by using these devices too much?

The solution is to have a schedule to know where to stop and give a rest to your eyes. But if you focus on your daily work you may forget when to do that… . So you need something to recall you when you used your device too much.

This application is based by the ophthalmology rule , The 20 20 20, which says every 20 minutes pause looking at screen and look 20 feet far for 20 second. So it\'s task is to set a reminder automatically to remind you every 20 minutes (or more or less according to your situation) to ensure that you are being careful not to hurt your eyes.
